name: Mouse Mirror Madness
description:
Trapped in a cave! It sure is spooky down here, and your only hope of escape is to use mirrors to angle a single beam of light all the way to the end.

Solve precarious puzzles and conquer that which lurks in the dark.

Controls
  • WADS / Arrow Keys: Move left/right
  • Space: Jump
  • Mouse left click: Move objects
  • Mouse right click: Rotate objects
  • Q and E (while holding left click): Rotate objects
  • Escape: Pause menu
  • F11: Fullscreen
  • Open Bracket "[": Volume Down
  • Close Bracket "]": Volume Up
